page.title: 14Farm Shop *** Garden Centre
page.content:
{(see also p.11) We are open Thursday, Friday, Saturday and Sunday from 9.00_5.00. The rest of the days we concentrate on getting our own produce into the{whole-salers and on Wednesday we get the shop stocked up.
The Gardenwise Centre first opened for business in 1974. It is in Lower Odcombe, next to the main road from Yeovil to Montacute, where there are large advertising and direction hoardings. There are two acres of land. It operates as a wholesale nurseryman and retail Garden Centre, employing one person full time together with someone on the Youth Training Scheme. Casual labour is taken on as necessary.
